lore: The Smoke Devil emerged from the ashes after a war lost in time and is unable to think. Since then it has traveled the world in silence with a lifeless gaze, leaving behind a mysterious cloud of dust. Wherever it goes there is anger, a fight, an argument, or maybe even a war, as if its very presence was the embodiment of Chaos. Although it carries a sword, it never gets into trouble and will only use it to defend itself.
menagerieDialog: You're the big boss here, right? You should share some of them resources with me, neh?
I prefer blades over magic. What's the fun in casting a spell when there's no blood to show in the aftermath of your effort?
The devil's in the details, neh?\n\n(Well, that was random.)
I have an idea! You should raise your kingdom's taxes. That way, you can steal from everyone with impunity.
I absolutely, positively did not steal this bag of coins from anyone.
name: Smoke Devil
